price: او بشپړ لمونځ كوئ، زكات وركوئ او د رسول امر منئ، ښايي چې رحم درباندې وشي.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
